content: प्रस्रवः {@--1@} Trickling forth, gushing, flowing or oozing out. {@--2@} A flow, stream. {@--3@} Milk flowing from the breast or udder; प्रस्रवेण (<ab>v. l.</ab> for प्रस्नवेन) अभिवर्षंती वत्सालोकप्रवर्तिना <ls>R. 1. 84.</ls> {@--4@} Urine. {@--5@} The overflowing scum of boiling rice. --वाः (<ab>pl.</ab>) Falling or gushing tears.
